Text: This is a horrible download. It's a FLAC file, which is ok, but the entire CD is one FLAC. It's highly annoying.

Nice Album. I really like Suzanne Vega. Her voice is awesome. was searching for this album for a long time.

Thanks for the upload. Audio quality is great
IDIOT !!! The files are not separated

@williamevans09 and others

You can separate out the individual tracks by using a free Windows utility called CUETools.
